summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5622 for the improvement of East Northlake Avenue, from 10th Avenue Northeast to University Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74150, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
